content: Nov AI: Local RAG LLM System

Nov AI is a locally running **Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) AI system** that allows users to interact with an LLM while storing persistent sessions and documents. The backend is built with **FastAPI (Python 3.10)** and the frontend with **React + Vite**.

Each user has **their own sessions**, which store chat history. Documents can be uploaded and attached to sessions, improving AI responses by using **retrieval-based augmentation (RAG)**. The AI model used is **Deepseek R1 Distilled**, a lightweight model optimized for reasoning and context retention.
You can find the source code here: [Nov AI GitHub](https://github.com/hector-oviedo/novai)

git clone https://github.com/hector-oviedo/novai
cd novai
conda create --name novai python=3.10
conda activate novai
pip install -r requirements.txt
python main.py
The backend uses **FastAPI**, manages sessions, and integrates the local AI model for inference. It runs on **localhost:8000** by default.

cd frontend
npm install
npm run dev
The frontend is a **React app using Vite**, which provides the chat interface and document management. Once running, access the app at **http://localhost:5173**.
- **Documents** can be uploaded and attached to sessions.
- **Chat messages are stored** for persistent interactions.
- The AI model **retrieves relevant document context** and generates responses.
